properties.script:
import base64

base64_message = "$activity.definition_activity_0209ACNTD6OXJ38tgz5KaeDX4l7WYqzQ7Al.output.jsonpath_queries.content$"
base64_bytes = base64_message.encode('ascii')
message_bytes = base64.b64decode(base64_bytes)
decoded_content = message_bytes.decode('ascii')

properties.description: This python script splits the ACP rule into two parts, the first part, until the Attribute name 'action' which is at the beginning of the core rule. The first part is the metadata. Then, it formats it in JSON prefixing the {"action" part.
properties.script:
import sys

split = sys.argv[1].split('action')
rule_content = "{\"action" + split[1]

actions.title: Execute Python Script To Base64 Encode ACP Rule JSON

properties.display_name: Execute Python Script To Base64 Encode ACP Rule JSON
properties.script:
import base64
import sys

message = sys.argv[1]
message_bytes = message.encode('ascii')
base64_bytes = base64.b64encode(message_bytes)
base64_message = base64_bytes.decode('ascii')
